effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

short_effect.black_2_white_2: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.black_white: The user unleashes a vicious blow after its cute act makes the target less wary. It may also make the target flinch.
